dataList.title: J Corp. Casino
dataList.content: GAAH!!! NOT AGAIN!!!

dataList.title: J Corp. Casino
dataList.content: I lost again, dammit! Why won't this losing streak end?!

dataList.title: Los Mariachis
dataList.content: Oye, espera, time out! We're gonna need to do some customer care, team!

dataList.title: Los Mariachis
dataList.content: Dear Customer, I hope you haven’t forgotten the rules, have you?

dataList.title: J Corp. Casino
dataList.content: B-but… That was... I just blew all of my savings…

dataList.title: Los Mariachis
dataList.content: If you insist on ruining the mood of the table, we might be forced to throw a pañata party out of you.
(Uh, what’s a pañata party?)
<I don't even wanna know…>
Pressured by gentle intimidation, the weeping guest stood up from their seat.
And then, being handed a pair of maracas from the staff, they…
… started dancing, sobbing all the way…
What’s this now…?

dataList.title: Los Mariachis
dataList.content: There’s a rule every visitor to this floor must follow—una tradición mariachi, if you will.

dataList.title: Los Mariachis
dataList.content: Gambling is entertainment, an activity done purely for fun; thus, the sadness and pain it brings must be sublimated into dance.
Allow this knight to demonstrate what dancing is about!
Alas, they were harsher judges than they seemed.

dataList.title: Los Mariachis
dataList.content: This one won’t do.

dataList.title: Los Mariachis
dataList.content: There's not an ounce of sincerity in her moves.
What in the name of chivalry dost thou mean?!

dataList.title: Los Mariachis
dataList.content: Dance is a window to the heart.

dataList.title: Los Mariachis
dataList.content: Without a clear and pure heart, it loses all meaning.
…I find thine assessment rather disgracious.

dataList.title: LCCB
dataList.content: This is getting further out of hand… What are you doing, Saude?

dataList.title: LCCB
dataList.content: Oh, just working on our statement of apology to the company, given the way this is going!
